data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Unnao that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Unnao, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Unnao, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Unnao, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 34,192 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Unnao.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bari (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Unnao
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Unnao, Uttar Pradesh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, help the 34,192 believers in Unnao to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

location.name: Unnao
location.people_groups_list: Lodha Jariya, Brahmin Kanaujia, Bania Ummad, Pasi Gujar, Dhobi Sribastab
